Revert - depends on concentration. 6X is a commonly used dilution and is a 1 to 1,000,000 dilution. "Heavily diluted" is more appropriate.

Moved section of lead relating to prevalence and regulation to reflect order in which it appears in the body of the article - should make it a little less confusing to navigate.
